mapper.update: update tb_data_reporting_target t set t.record_status =0 where t.target_id=#{targetId}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_data_reporting_target t (target_id, id, parent_id, order, target_name, department_id, department_name, is_muilt_row, unit, target_type, record_status, creator_account, created_time, modifier_account, modified_time) values ( #{targetId}, #{targetId}, #{parentId}, #{order}, #{targetName}, #{departmentId}, #{departmentName}, #{isMuiltTow}, #{unit}, #{targetType}, #{recordStatus}, #{creatorAccount}, #{createdTime}, #{modifierAccount}, #{modifiedTime} #{targetComment} )
